name: bide
flavor_text: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.
effect_text_extend:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pok√©mon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_text_simple: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
